fields.description: the corporate directory uses a custom font packaged with the app. We need to be able to support loading this custom font as per http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Custom_Fonts and https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.xaml.media.fontfamily.aspx

comments.body:
See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/cc189010%28v=vs.105%29.aspx#silverlight_fonts for the list of supported fonts on Windows phone.

Not sure if we take an approach of looking for fonts in the expected irectory and then using a FontSource to load them all up, or if we match font names against this set of supported ones, and if not in the list we then use the URI form of specifying a FontFamily under set_font() calls.
